table.name: vtiger_whatsapplog
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_whatsapplog` ( `whatsapplogid` int(19) NOT NULL, `whatsapplog_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `whatsapplog_sendername` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `whatsapplog_chatid` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `messagelog_type` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `messagelog_body` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `whatsapplog_quotemessage` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `whatsapplog_contactid` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `whatsapplog_unreadread` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `whatsapplog_withoccode` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `whatsapplog_withccode` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `whatsapplog_datetime` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `whatsapplog_msgid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `whatsapplog_your_number` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `whatsapplog_important` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `whatsapplog_response` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `whatsapplog_request` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `whatsapplog_botid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `whatsapplog_displayname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `whatsapp_numberactive` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`whatsapplogid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_whatsapplogcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_whatsapplogcf` ( `whatsapplogid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`whatsapplogid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
